import React, { createElement } from 'react' import './EditProf.css' import { useState } from 'react' export const EditProf = () => { const [name,setName]=useState("") const [ach,setAch]=useState([]) console.log(ach) const addBlock=()=>{ let ele = document.createElement('div'); ele.id = "ach" let inp = document.createElement('input'); inp.type = "text" inp.placeholder = "enter achievements" inp.required = true; inp.addEventListener(onchange,(e)=>{console.log("shiva");setAch(e.target.value)}) ele.appendChild(inp) document.querySelector('.edit').appendChild(ele) } return ( <>

Edit Profile

Upload image
Full Name
{setName(e.target.value)}}/>
Achievements
{setAch(e.target.value)}}/>
) }
